languages.text: Паскалю Ханейманну не удалось встретиться со своим наставником. Однако в своем искании он наткнулся на брата по вере, носящего загадочное имя и имеющего загадочную связь с архимагосом Амарнатом.
Pasqal Haneumann did not manage to meet his mentor. But in his pursuit, he found a brother in faith bearing a strange name, who is somehow linked to the Archmagos Amarnat.
languages.original_text: Паскалю Ханейманну не удалось встретиться со своим наставником. Однако в своем искании он наткнулся на брата по вере, носящего загадочное имя и имеющего загадочную связь с архимагосом Амарнатом.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal Haneumann wasn't able to meet his mentor. But in his pursuit, he found a brother in faith bearing a strange name, who is somehow linked to the Archmagos Amarnat.
Pasqal Haneumann did not manage to meet his mentor. But in his pursuit, he found a brother in faith bearing a strange name, who is somehow linked to the Archmagos Amarnat.
Pasqal Haneumann did not manage to meet his mentor. But in his pursuit, he found a brother in faith bearing a strange name, who is somehow linked to the Archmagos Amarnat.

languages.text: Pasqal Haneumann n'a pas réussi à rencontrer son mentor, mais sa quête lui a permis de trouver un frère de foi au nom étrange qui est lié d'une certaine manière à l'archimagos Amarnat.
languages.original_text: Pasqal Haneumann did not manage to meet his mentor. But in his pursuit, he found a brother in faith bearing a strange name, who is somehow linked to the Archmagos Amarnat.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal Haneumann n'a pas réussi à rencontrer son mentor, mais sa quête lui a permis de trouver un frère de foi au nom étrange qui est lié d'une certaine manière à l'archimagos Amarnat.

languages.text: 帕斯卡·哈努曼未能找到他的导师，但在搜寻的过程中，他遇到了一位名字古怪的教会兄弟，似乎与阿玛纳特大贤者有某种联系。
languages.original_text: Pasqal Haneumann did not manage to meet his mentor. But in his pursuit, he found a brother in faith bearing a strange name, who is somehow linked to the Archmagos Amarnat.

traits.locale_text: 帕斯卡·哈努曼未能找到他的导师，但在搜寻的过程中，他遇到了一位名字古怪的教会兄弟，似乎与阿玛纳特大贤者有某种联系。

languages.text: パスカル・ヘニュマンは恩師に会うことができなかった。しかし、大賢人アマルナトと何らかのつながりのある、変わった名を持つ信仰の友を見つけた。
languages.original_text: Pasqal Haneumann did not manage to meet his mentor. But in his pursuit, he found a brother in faith bearing a strange name, who is somehow linked to the Archmagos Amarnat.

traits.locale_text: パスカル・ヘニュマンは恩師に会うことができなかった。しかし、大賢人アマルナトと何らかのつながりのある、変わった名を持つ信仰の友を見つけた。

languages.text: Es ist Pasqal Haneumann nicht gelungen, seinen Mentor zu treffen. Er hat bei seiner Suche jedoch einen Glaubensbruder mit einem merkwürdigen Namen getroffen, der in irgendeiner Verbindung mit Erzmagos Amarnat steht.
languages.original_text: Pasqal Haneumann did not manage to meet his mentor. But in his pursuit, he found a brother in faith bearing a strange name, who is somehow linked to the Archmagos Amarnat.

traits.locale_text: Es ist Pasqal Haneumann nicht gelungen, seinen Mentor zu treffen. Er hat bei seiner Suche jedoch einen Glaubensbruder mit einem merkwürdigen Namen getroffen, der in irgendeiner Verbindung mit Erzmagos Amarnat steht.

languages.text: Pasqal Haneumann no se ha encontrado con su mentor, pero sí con un hermano de fe con nombre extraño y un vínculo misterioso con el Archimagos Amarnat.
languages.original_text: Pasqal Haneumann did not manage to meet his mentor. But in his pursuit, he found a brother in faith bearing a strange name, who is somehow linked to the Archmagos Amarnat.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal Haneumann no se ha encontrado con su mentor, pero sí con un hermano de fe con nombre extraño y un vínculo misterioso con el Archimagos Amarnat.

languages.text: Pasqal Haneumann, yönderiyle görüşemedi. Fakat onu ararken tuhaf bir isme sahip, bir şekilde Başmagos Amarnat'a bağlı olan, inançlı bir kardeşini buldu.
languages.original_text: Pasqal Haneumann did not manage to meet his mentor. But in his pursuit, he found a brother in faith bearing a strange name, who is somehow linked to the Archmagos Amarnat.
